content:
International Association for the Preservation of Spiritualist and Occult Periodicals: Search IAPSOP Home About IAPSOP IAPSOP Practices Contribute to IAPSOP Contact IAPSOP Search IAPSOP IAPSOP Privacy Policy IAPSOP Home Standard Spiritualist and Occult Corpus Spiritualist and Occult Periodicals Private and Mail-Order Lessons Ephemera Spirit History Psypioneer Archive   You can perform a restricted Google-based search on the contents of the IAPSOP site and archive below. All IAPSOP materials are exposed to Google's search crawlers. NB: If the Archive has recently been updated, the contents of journals may not yet have been added to Google's indices by the Google crawlers, and therefore will not appear in the search results.   Search Only IAPSOP Archives Search Only the Standard Spiritualist and Occult Corpus (SSOC) Search Only the IAPSOP periodical archive Search Only the Spirit History archive Search Only the Psypioneer archive Search All Google Indices
